features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to download Instagram videos quickly and easily

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: No hidden fees, subscriptions, or limits. Download unlimited videos without paying a cent.

noRegistration.title: No Registration
noRegistration.description: Skip the hassle of creating accounts or logging in. Instant access with no personal data required.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Our optimized servers process your requests instantly, delivering videos in seconds, not minutes.

howItWorks.title: How It Works

copy.title: Copy URL

copy.descriptionMobile: Find the Instagram video you want and copy its URL

paste.title: Paste URL
paste.descriptionDesktop: Paste the copied URL into our downloader input field at the top of this page
paste.descriptionMobile: Paste the URL into our downloader input field

download.title: Download
download.descriptionDesktop: Click the download button and your video will be saved directly to your device
download.descriptionMobile: Click download and save the video to your device

testimonials.title: Trusted by Thousands
testimonials.description: Join thousands of satisfied users who download Instagram videos every day

frequentlyAsked.title: Frequently Asked Questions
frequentlyAsked.description: Find answers to common questions about our Instagram video downloader

q1.trigger: Is Nextup Studio free to use?
q1.content: Yes, Nextup Studio is 100% free with no hidden charges or limits.

q2.trigger: Do I need to sign up or register?
q2.content: No registration is required. You can use all features instantly.

q3.trigger: Is it safe to use this service?
q3.content: Absolutely! We do not store any personal data or Instagram credentials.

q1.trigger: What video quality can I download?
q1.content: You can download videos in the highest available resolution (HD, if available).

q2.trigger: Does this work with all Instagram posts and reels?
q2.content: Yes, you can download public videos and reels using Nextup Studio.
